sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) When using any weapon with the Blast quality or explosive device, the character may spend advantage or triumph to exclude one target that would normally be affected by the explosion. Multiple targets may be excluded in this manner, but the total number may not exceed his ranks in Selective Detonation.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Selective Detonation</name> <number>TAL0001257</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-05 22:53:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>124fa3e52f18a850e0f497eef699b64a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-05 22:53:32</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
